column5: I had plans to go out fishing with Jaydub at 8 pm.  He bailed on me because he "Did not think we would catch anything." Well, despite the cold it was beautiful out there and I had a blast (alone). After texting Jaydub this morning he also said "I had better have a pic of the bass I caught"  LOL!,  Here it is.  You missed out bro. Truth be known that fishing was slow but I got back to the launch at midnight and caught countless perch in 25 minutes, so that was fun too.  Here is your pic Jaydub!
Since when does catching anything have to do with quality time with a buddy????  Nice bass, glad you had a good time!!  Burt

Who said anything about a buddy...   Okay, so I probably should have gone but night time fall fishing without minnows is pretty tough and I thought maybe if I stayed home I'd get lucky   .  Congrates on the smallie Cudz...let the streak continue!
Just tell the truth.  It was too cold for you.  Maybe it was too late for you.
cudz showed his pics, where's yours?
LOL! I think he got skunked.
Nice fish man. Just goes to show you, you never know whats going to happen out there. At least one of you got lucky! :clapping:LOL
At first I thought it was a religious thread.lol Nice bass. Its cold enough in the day, I can only imagine night time! That's addiction.lol
Just asking here,before or after dark.
It was midnight brian.  Right at the lauch (marina) where they keep the light on.  Lots of fish.  Hundreds.
The crappies got to be there too then.Better eats then those perch.
maybe.  I did not see them.  There were lots of perch. Mostly small but the odd 10 incher. Maybe I will go tonight.
